entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening and before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
